(의사1)

pa: The situation is very bad.

and we will insert a chest tube right away.
 And after that, we will remove the bullet.

nên phải đặt ống nội khí quản ngay.

어느 날 거짓말처럼

pa: told you yet.

happened?

so hopefully they fit you.

nên mong là sẽ vừa.
